thread.title: Why China is worth a visit
thread.title_full: Why China is worth a visit

author: Deccan
title: Why China is worth a visit
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 17, 2015, 13.35 pm China is surely a place to be on your travel list (Photo: DC/ BoredPanda) China is a beautiful tourist destination that one should surely visit. Being the largest country in the world, it’s not that you can travel this place easily and quickly.
But China is surely a place to be on your travel list.
Here are few places that are worth your time and must visit.
1. Rainbow Mountain
Photo: BoredPanda
2. Hukou Falls
Photo: BoredPanda
3. Heaven Lake
I
Photo: BoredPanda
4. Flaming Mountains
Photo: BoredPanda
5. Five Fingers Peak Of Huangshizhai
Photo: BoredPanda
6. Jiǔzhàigōu - Mirror Lake
Photo: BoredPanda
7. Long Rice Terrace
Photo: BoredPanda
8. The Great Wall of China
Photo: BoredPanda
So this time plan your vacation in China.
